body:
Bss-One is searching for an SMART Developer in php/mysql based technologies.

Good knowledge of PHP/MySQL, HTML/CSS/Javascript
OOP programming 
Event-driven programming 
Knowledge IMAP protocol would be a plus.
Good level in spoken and written English or Italian.

Be able to work in team but also independently

What we offer:

Very competitive salary package;
Performance based bonuses;
Yearly performance reviews and compensation based on your results;
Career development programs;
You will have the opportunity to learn new technologies and products.
The chance to meet our clients and work in clients’ locations(Europa)

WORK SITE: IASI
Send us your CV at job@bss-one.net
title: MIDDLE LEVEL PHP DEVELOPER
locations: Strada bularga 8, Iași, Județul Iași, România
